summary.span: 当实现时，对 值进行动画处理的抽象类。

span.span: Abstract class that, when implemented, animates a value.

span.para: 请参阅[自定义动画概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/custom-animations-overview.md)有关扩展动画类信息。
See the [Custom Animations Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/custom-animations-overview.md) for information about extending animation classes.

summary.span: 创建此 的可修改克隆，从而深度复制此对象的值。

span.span: Creates a modifiable clone of this , making deep copies of this object's values.

summary.span: 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定（但可能不再解析），但不复制动画或其当前值。

span.span: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.

returns.span: 当前对象的可修改复本。

span.span: A modifiable clone of the current object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结对象 (或任何对象)。This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen objects (or any object). 为方便起见，此方法隐藏继承的版本使用的强类型实现。For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation. 有关详情，请参阅。For more information, see .

span.span: Gets the current value of the animation.

MemberSignature.Value: public char GetCurrentValue (char defaultOriginValue, char defaultDestinationValue, System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock animationClock);
.method public hidebysig instance char GetCurrentValue(char defaultOriginValue, char defaultDestinationValue, class System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock animationClock) cil managed
public: char GetCurrentValue(char defaultOriginValue, char defaultDestinationValue, System::Windows::Media::Animation::AnimationClock ^ animationClock);
override this.GetCurrentValue : char * char * System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock -> char

param.name: defaultOriginValue
param.span: 如果动画不具有其自己的起始值，则为动画提供原始值。

span.span: The origin value provided to the animation if the animation does not have its own start value.

param.name: defaultDestinationValue
param.span: 如果动画没有自己的目标值，则为提供给动画的目标值。

span.span: The destination value provided to the animation if the animation does not have its own destination value.

param.name: animationClock
param.span: 一个 ，它可以生成供动画用来生成它的输出值的 或 值。

span.span: The which can generate the or value to be used by the animation to generate its output value.
Gets the current value of the animation.

returns.span: 此动画信任的值应为该属性的当前值。

span.span: The value this animation believes should be the current value for the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值`defaultOriginValue`参数取决于在组合链中的动画的位置：The value of the `defaultOriginValue` parameter depends on the animation’s position in the composition chain: - 如果动画是组合链中的第一个位置，并且它将替换另一个动画`defaultOriginValue`是它已替换时该动画的输出。If the animation is in the first position in a composition chain and it replaces another animation, `defaultOriginValue` is the output of that animation at the time it was replaced. - 如果动画是组合链中的第一个位置，并且没有动画存在替换，`defaultOriginValue`是经过动画处理属性的基值。If the animation is in the first position in a composition chain and no animation exists to replace, `defaultOriginValue` is the base value of the animated property. - 如果此动画不在组合的第一个位置链接，然后`defaultOriginValue`是已在组合链中前一个动画返回的值不是。If this animation is not in the first position of a composition chain, then `defaultOriginValue` is the value that is returned by the previous animation in the composition chain that has an that is not . 值`defaultDestinationValue`参数取决于是否没有前一属性复合层。The value of the `defaultDestinationValue` parameter depends on whether there is a previous property composition layer. - 如果没有以前的属性复合层`defaultDestinationValue`是该层的输出。If there is a previous property composition layer, `defaultDestinationValue` is the output from that layer. - 如果没有以前的组合层`defaultDestinationValue`是进行动画处理的属性的基值。If there is no previous composition layer, `defaultDestinationValue` is the base value of the property that you are animating. 有关动画组合的详细信息，请参阅[动画和计时系统概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview.md)。For more information about animation composition, see the [Animation and Timing System Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview.md). 有关创建自定义动画类型的详细信息，请参阅[自定义动画概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/custom-animations-overview.md)。For more information about creating custom animation types, see the [Custom Animations Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/custom-animations-overview.md).

param.name: defaultOriginValue
param.span: 如果动画不具有其自己的起始值，则为动画提供原始值。

span.span: The origin value provided to the animation if the animation does not have its own start value.

param.name: defaultDestinationValue
param.span: 如果动画没有自己的目标值，则为提供给动画的目标值。

span.span: The destination value provided to the animation if the animation does not have its own destination value.

param.name: animationClock
param.span: 一个 ，它可以生成供动画用来生成它的输出值的 或 值。

span.span: The which can generate the or value to be used by the animation to generate its output value.
Gets the current value of the animation.

returns.span: 此动画信任的值应为该属性的当前值。

span.span: The value this animation believes should be the current value for the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值`defaultOriginValue`参数取决于在组合链中的动画的位置：The value of the `defaultOriginValue` parameter depends on the animation’s position in the composition chain: - 如果动画是组合链中的第一个位置，并且它将替换另一个动画`defaultOriginValue`是它已替换时该动画的输出。If the animation is in the first position in a composition chain and it replaces another animation, `defaultOriginValue` is the output of that animation at the time it was replaced. - 如果动画是组合链中的第一个位置，并且没有动画存在替换，`defaultOriginValue`是经过动画处理属性的基值。If the animation is in the first position in a composition chain and no animation exists to replace, `defaultOriginValue` is the base value of the animated property. - 如果此动画不在组合的第一个位置链接，然后`defaultOriginValue`是已在组合链中前一个动画返回的值不是。If this animation is not in the first position of a composition chain, then `defaultOriginValue` is the value that is returned by the previous animation in the composition chain that has an that is not . 值`defaultDestinationValue`参数取决于是否没有前一属性复合层。The value of the `defaultDestinationValue` parameter depends on whether there is a previous property composition layer. - 如果没有以前的属性复合层`defaultDestinationValue`是该层的输出。If there is a previous property composition layer, `defaultDestinationValue` is the output from that layer. - 如果没有以前的组合层`defaultDestinationValue`是进行动画处理的属性的基值。If there is no previous composition layer, `defaultDestinationValue` is the base value of the property that you are animating. 有关动画组合的详细信息，请参阅[动画和计时系统概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview.md)。For more information about animation composition, see the [Animation and Timing System Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview.md). 有关创建自定义动画类型的详细信息，请参阅[自定义动画概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/custom-animations-overview.md)。For more information about creating custom animation types, see the [Custom Animations Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/custom-animations-overview.md).

MemberSignature.Value: protected abstract char GetCurrentValueCore (char defaultOriginValue, char defaultDestinationValue, System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock animationClock);

abstract member GetCurrentValueCore : char * char * System.Windows.Media.Animation.AnimationClock -> char

param.name: defaultOriginValue
param.span: 建议使用的原始值。如果动画没有自己显式设置的起始值，则使用该值。

span.span: The suggested origin value, used if the animation does not have its own explicitly set start value.

param.name: defaultDestinationValue
param.span: 建议使用的目标值。如果动画没有自己显式设置的结束值，则使用该值。

span.span: The suggested destination value, used if the animation does not have its own explicitly set end value.

param.name: animationClock
param.span: 用于生成宿主动画使用的 或 的 。

span.span: An that generates the or used by the host animation.

summary.span: 计算一个值，该值表示正在进行动画处理的属性的当前值，并由主机动画确定。

span.span: Calculates a value that represents the current value of the property being animated, as determined by the host animation.

returns.span: 计算得出的属性值，该值由当前动画确定。

span.span: The calculated value of the property, as determined by the current animation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值`defaultOriginValue`参数取决于在组合链中的动画的位置：The value of the `defaultOriginValue` parameter depends on the animation’s position in the composition chain: - 如果动画是组合链中的第一个位置，并且它将替换另一个动画`defaultOriginValue`是它已替换时该动画的输出。If the animation is in the first position in a composition chain and it replaces another animation, `defaultOriginValue` is the output of that animation at the time it was replaced. - 如果动画是组合链中的第一个位置，并且没有动画存在替换，`defaultOriginValue`是经过动画处理属性的基值。If the animation is in the first position in a composition chain and no animation exists to replace, `defaultOriginValue` is the base value of the animated property. - 如果此动画不在组合的第一个位置链接，然后`defaultOriginValue`是已在组合链中前一个动画返回的值不是。If this animation is not in the first position of a composition chain, then `defaultOriginValue` is the value that is returned by the previous animation in the composition chain that has an that is not . 值`defaultDestinationValue`参数取决于是否没有前一属性复合层。The value of the `defaultDestinationValue` parameter depends on whether there is a previous property composition layer. - 如果没有以前的属性复合层`defaultDestinationValue`是该层的输出。If there is a previous property composition layer, `defaultDestinationValue` is the output from that layer. - 如果没有以前的组合层`defaultDestinationValue`是进行动画处理的属性的基值。If there is no previous composition layer, `defaultDestinationValue` is the base value of the property that you are animating. 有关动画组合的详细信息，请参阅[动画和计时系统概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview.md)。For more information about animation composition, see the [Animation and Timing System Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/animation-and-timing-system-overview.md). 有关创建自定义动画类型的详细信息，请参阅[自定义动画概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/custom-animations-overview.md)。For more information about creating custom animation types, see the [Custom Animations Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/graphics-multimedia/custom-animations-overview.md).
